title: Reason for increase in national debt

content.question: Which of the following could have caused the national debt to change from $12 trillion to $15 trillion?

choices.label: A household debt increase of $3 trillion
A government budget deficit of $3 trillion
A government budget surplus of $3 trillion
A decrease of $3 trillion in financial capital inflows
An increase of $3 trillion in business debt

content.answer: A government budget deficit of $3 trillion

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
